description: This is a bid for 3D terrestrial scanners for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans. This project aims to provide 3D terrestrial scanners to the department.
full_summary:
# Government Tender of 3D Terrestrial Scanners

## Reference Information

* Tender Reference: [PW-__MB-006-29401](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/3f0b056ac629d5d05d37ada340f96c48/ABES.PROD.PW__MB.B006.E29401.EBSU000.PDF)
* Solicitation Number: [F7017-240336/A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/848fe1128de09751178d9670556bd060d/ABES.PROD.PW__MB.B006.F29401.EBSU0pdff)
* Published on: [2024-10-09](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/3f0b056ac629d5e05d37ada340f96d48/ABES.PROD.PW__MB.B006.E29401.EBSU000.PDF))

## Tender Details
### Tender Purpose

A procurement notice is issued by the Government of Canada to procure the supply of 3D terrestrial scanners for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: [2024-10-29T14:00:00](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/748fe1128d09751178d9670556bd060lpsncieaoPOPPdf)
* Expected Contract Start Date: [None](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/349fe1128Posts/';
* Expected Contract End Date: [None](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/849fe1128Posts-;))

## Tender Requirements
The successful supplier shall provide 3D terrestrial scanners to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans as outlined in the [Statement of Requirement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/10/08/3f0b056ac629dcd6c97e347060a79a59/()) annex.

## Government Involvement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
